channel.title: GER:BAYN on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in GER:BAYN on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Bayer Gets Boost From Older Drugs, Corn Seeds in Outlook Lift
item.description: Bayer AG benefited from surprisingly strong demand for its aging blockbuster eye and blood-thinning medicines in the second quarter, helping the German company raise its forecast for the year.
